name: BizAgi
tag_list: bpm, business-process-management, workflow, workflow-automation, process-automation, bpmn, bpm-suite, bpms, bpm-software, bpm-solutions
overview:
Leading provider of Business Process Management (BPM) and Workflow Automation Solutions.

—————————-

BizAgi Limited is a privately owned company established in 1989. Since its foundation, BizAgi has been focused on the development of technologies and methodologies to support the continuous improvement of its clientsâ€™ business processes. BizAgi stands for Business Agility: our aim is to empower business people and provide them with unprecedented adaptability to changing market conditions.

BizAgi offers a free Process Modeler (freeware) for process diagramming and documentation, and a complete BPM Suite for process automation. Our BPM Suite is the result of more than 20 years of experience delivering process automation and optimization solutions and it is available in multiple editions to support the varying needs of organizations. From the entry-level and inexpensive Xpress Edition for departmental solutions or small and medium businesses (SMBs), to the corporate editions for mission critical and core business processes, satisfying the most demanding needs in larger organizations. Our corporate editions (Enterprise .NET and Enterprise JEE) are similar in functionality, the only difference is the platform where they execute.

BizAgi has offices in the UK, Spain and Colombia and is present in more than 25 countries worldwide through an extended Partner network that includes some of the most important technology and business consulting firms.
